metadata.title: Women's UPF 50+ Long Sleeve Lightweight Quick Dry Sun Protection Zip Pullover Thumb Hole
features: FABRIC: 90% Polyester 10% Spandex lightweight and breathable 4 way stretch fabric will keep you cool and comfortable when your out on the water or just trying to beat back the summer heat.
TECHNOLOGY: Designed with Coolcore fabric technology which dries 45% faster and cools 19% faster than other performance fabrics.
STRETCH: 4-Way stretch fabric offers superior stretch for maximum mobility and comfort.

MOISTURE WICKING: Moisture wicking fabric disperses any moisture like sweat throughout the shirt getting rid of any wet spot. This allows for added breathability and faster drying to keep you cool, comfortable, and dry.
description: The EAG Elite Mossy Oak Women's Quarter Zip Long Sleeve Sun Pullover is powered by Coolcore technology. This ultra-light weight fabric technology offers industry leading thermoregulation, drying 45% faster, cooling 19% faster than the competition. The knit fabrication offers superior 4-way stretch to maximize mobility and comfort. Superior moisture wicking capabilities absorb sweat and other moisture into the fibers and disperses them throughout the shirt, getting rid of any wet spot sweat typically build up. This dispersion of moisture allows for superior breathability and faster drying, to keep you cool, comfortable, and dry. The EAG Elite Quarter Zip is engineered by women and made for the outdoors. Give this Long Sleeve Sun Pullover a try, because when you look good, you feel good, and when you feel good.
